name: undulled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If an emotion or feeling is undulled you still feel it as strongly as before: Anger at fuel prices up to 10p per litre more than in the South remains undulled.
If an object or someone's eyes are undulled, it is or they are still bright. : Her eyes were bright and alert, undulled by circumstance, and clearly untouched by the monotony of daily life.
More examplesFewer examplesTheir affections were fresh and lively, undulled by easy access and long continuance with each other.He sensed glory now with an instinct still undulled.The bouquet of plastic pink roses adorned with American flags was undulled by the sun and rain.
